Honestly, I delete the subtitles.  I'm not old and deaf yet.  I could understand in a movie like Snatch, when you have brad pitt talking like he's an irish auctioneer, but even I could make out most of what he was saying and it's actually meant to be so you can't understand him.  That's the whole point.  Anyway, I digress.  The point is, like other people have said, IT'S FREE.  If you people want perfection, but the dvd/blu-ray and stop your complaining.  It's sad that people like this are why we are being stereotyped as a lazy country.  We think even our free, illegal stuff should be perfect.  Grow up and get out of the house.

V:8
A:6

Just my opinion no offence intended
